text: Five Minutes of Heaven is a 2009 British Irish drama thriller movie directed by Oliver Hirschbiegel and starring Liam Neeson, James Nesbitt, Anamaria Marinca, Mark Davison, Richard Dormer. It won for an BAFTA Award in 2010 and was distributed by BBC Television. == Other websites == * * * Category:2009 drama movies Category:2009 thriller movies Category:2000s drama thriller movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Irish thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Oliver Hirschbiegel
title: Five Minutes of Heaven
